name: G.R.I.D. (Game Related Infectious Disease)
description:
G.R.I.D. is  a small game made during the Black & White Jam of April 2022 in a few days on RPG Maker MV.

You're playing as a white blood cell, a leukocyte fighting an infection from the inside. You have to look around, navigate the intricate map of this clump of cell and get to the center to destroy it.

__________________________________________________________________________________________
